markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs=""
>
[Eye of the Unseen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1367)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 73</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This prosthetic eye was designed by elven crafters but comes in a range of appearances for different ancestries. While wearing the eye, you gain a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks.

<document level="2" id="action-1056" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Eye of the Unseen
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Eye of the Unseen (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 4,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

This functions as the _eye of the unseen_, except the item bonus is +2 and it casts a 5th-level _see invisibility_ on you.
name: Eye of the Unseen (Greater)
